mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GW_OF_MESSAGE_TARGET ( MESSAGE_SEQ, EMP_NO, READ_YN, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( #{message_seq}, #{emp_no}, 'N', 'N' )
mapper.select: -- 받은 쪽지 개수를 가져온다 / getMessageReceiveCount / @ message.xml / 시행 문서 조회 SELECT COUNT(ORAGMP.F_GET_SORT_SEQ(GONT.EMP_NO)) EMP_SORT FROM GW_OF_MESSAGE_TARGET GONT ,GW_OF_MESSAGE GOM ,ORAGMP.CMEMPM EMP WHERE GONT.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND GONT.MESSAGE_SEQ = GOM.MESSAGE_SEQ AND GONT.READ_YN = 'N' AND GONT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND GOM.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND GONT.EMP_NO = EMP.EMPCODE AND EMP.RETIREDT IS NULL ORDER BY EMP_SORT ASC

SELECT GONT.MESSAGE_SEQ ,EMP.EMPNAME AS EMP_KO_NM ,EMP.DEPTCODE AS DEPT_CD ,DEPT.DEPTNAME AS DEPT_KO_NM ,CO.DIVNAME AS GRAD_KO_NM ,EMP.EMPCODE AS EMP_NO ,ORAGMP.F_GET_SORT_SEQ(GONT.EMP_NO) EMP_SORT FROM GW_OF_MESSAGE_TARGET GONT ,ORAGMP.CMEMPM EMP ,ORAGMP.CMDEPTM DEPT ,( SELECT * FROM ORAGMP.CMCOMMONM WHERE CMMCODE = 'PS01' ) CO WHERE MESSAGE_SEQ = #{message_seq} AND GONT.EMP_NO = EMP.EMPCODE AND EMP.GRADEDIV = CO.DIVCODE AND EMP.DEPTCODE = DEPT.DEPTCODE AND EMP.RETIREDT IS NULL ORDER BY EMP_SORT ASC

SELECT GONT.MESSAGE_SEQ ,EMP.EMPNAME AS EMP_KO_NM ,EMP.DEPTCODE AS DEPT_CD ,DEPT.DEPTNAME AS DEPT_KO_NM ,CO.DIVNAME AS GRAD_KO_NM ,EMP.EMPCODE AS EMP_NO ,ORAGMP.F_GET_SORT_SEQ(GONT.CREATE_NO) EMP_SORT FROM GW_OF_MESSAGE GONT ,ORAGMP.CMEMPM EMP ,ORAGMP.CMDEPTM DEPT ,( SELECT * FROM ORAGMP.CMCOMMONM WHERE CMMCODE = 'PS01' ) CO WHERE MESSAGE_SEQ = #{message_seq} AND GONT.CREATE_NO = EMP.EMPCODE AND EMP.GRADEDIV = CO.DIVCODE AND EMP.DEPTCODE = DEPT.DEPTCODE AND EMP.RETIREDT IS NULL ORDER BY EMP_SORT ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE GW_OF_MESSAGE SET DELETE_YN = #{delete_yn}, MODIFY_NO = #{modify_no}, MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MESSAGE_SEQ = #{message_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT MT.EMP_NO ,EMP.EMPNAME AS EMP_KO_NM ,EMP.DEPTCODE AS DEPT_CD ,DEPT.DEPTNAME AS DEPT_KO_NM ,CO.DIVNAME AS GRAD_KO_NM ,TO_CHAR (READ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') READ_DT ,READ_YN ,ORAGMP.F_GET_SORT_SEQ(MT.EMP_NO) EMP_SORT FROM GW_OF_MESSAGE_TARGET MT ,ORAGMP.CMEMPM EMP ,ORAGMP.CMDEPTM DEPT ,( SELECT * FROM ORAGMP.CMCOMMONM WHERE CMMCODE = 'PS01' ) CO WHERE MT.MESSAGE_SEQ = #{message_seq} AND MT.EMP_NO = EMP.EMPCODE AND EMP.GRADEDIV = CO.DIVCODE AND EMP.DEPTCODE = DEPT.DEPTCODE AND EMP.RETIREDT IS NULL ORDER BY EMP_SORT ASC
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO GW_OF_MESSAGE_TARGET USING DUAL ON (EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND MESSAGE_SEQ = #{message_seq}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (EMP_NO, MESSAGE_SEQ, READ_YN) VALUES (#{emp_no}, #{message_seq}, 'N')
